\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 95389}

\subsection*{Most Ridiculous Thing I've Ever Done}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{K}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   &  & 2C-E & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 118.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I started sneezing blood and throwing up, I've never had an acid trip, but I could compare it to such stories. I DO NOT RECOMMEND. I had a bad `trip' and thought I was dying. It lasted I don't know how many hours until I was able to bring myself to drink some milk and take a hot bath, also I was terrified I was going to accidentally drown myself. Eyes TERRIBLY dilated, and overall, couldn't grasp reality. I HIGHLY DO NOT recommend.
